name: Bubble Burst - Bubble Shooter Puzzle Game
name_original: Bubble Burst - Bubble Shooter Puzzle Game
description:
THROW BUBBLES and MATCH COLORS to rescue your kidnapped BABY SEALS! Go on a epic journey across the snow, ice and freezing oceans to rescue every single baby you find. And aim the best you can: in Bubble Burst every bubble counts!

Make your way through dozens of levels and be ready to face difficult challenges! Can't save all the babies? Keep playing to earn coins and change them for powerful boosters! Now go, grab your bubble and save those cute little seals!

Play Bubble Burst right now!

Features:
• Easy to play, touch only!
• Incredible art
• Amazing music and audio
• Highly addictive gameplay
• The best Bubble Shooter on the App Store
• Earn coins and gems and get Boosters!
• Share your scores over Facebook
• Free updates with more levels!

Have fun!
